# 货仓选址

[AcWing-104-货仓选址](https://www.acwing.com/problem/content/106/)

## 实现

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int N = 100010;
int n;
int a[N];
int main()
{
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    sort(a + 1, a + n + 1);
    int pos;
    if(n % 2 == 0)
        pos = a[n / 2];
    else
        pos = a[n / 2 + 1];
    long long dis = 0;
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
        dis += abs(a[i] - pos);
    printf("%lld\n", dis);
    return 0;
}
```
